skills.answer: I'm proficient in **TypeScript, React, and Node.js**. Lately, I've been diving deep into WebGPU and performance optimization.

experience.answer: I have 4+ years of experience, most recently at **TechCorp** where I led the frontend migration to Next.js.

projects.answer: I've built several notable projects including a real-time collaboration tool, a data visualization dashboard, and this portfolio site!

contact.answer: You can reach me at **hello@example.com** or connect with me on [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com). I'm always open to interesting opportunities!

about.answer: I'm a passionate full-stack developer who loves building user-centric applications. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new tech or contributing to open source.
